subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Giants, who tied an N.F.L. record with 12 sacks on Sunday, experimented with using their top four pass rushers simultaneously, rather than shuttling them in and out.
snippet: The Giants, who tied an N.F.L. record with 12 sacks on Sunday, experimented with using their top four pass rushers simultaneously, rather than shuttling them in and out.
